snippet: The Senate introduced a sensible bill that would require lenders and colleges to educate students about their borrowing options. This measure deserves to become law.
abstract: Editorial praises a Senate bill that would require colleges and lenders to do a better job of making students aware of their borrowing options and the marked differences between federal and private student loans; asserts that the bill will help keep students and their families from falling into crippling debt.
lead_paragraph: The Senate introduced a sensible bill that would require lenders and colleges to educate students about their borrowing options. This measure deserves to become law.
